# Polishing v10

* `vdom.Helper`: cleanup
* `main.DeltaUpdates`: moved configs from `main.DomAccess` over, which had to be there when DU was a mixin
* `Readme.md`: new version
* `package.json`: updated the description & keywords

All changes in 1 commit: https://github.com/neomjs/neo/commit/48008704c308c9da69b509b9632349d2b3d3ac4d
